titleStmt.title: Babilon, a part of the Seconde vveeke of Guillaume de Saluste seigneur du Bartas, with the commentarie, and marginall notes of S.G.S. Englished by William L'Isle
Seconde sepmaine. Day 2. Part 2. English
titleStmt.author: Du Bartas, Guillaume de Salluste, seigneur, 1544-1590.
Lisle, William, 1579?-1637.
Goulart, Simon, 1543-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ed. Bollifant, for Richard Watkins,

notesStmt.note: A translation of book 2 of day 2 of: La seconde sepmaine.
A variant of the edition with imprint dated 1596.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
